Control Name: 1.6.5 There is awareness regarding the ratio of cost of production and non-production environments for this workload.
Control Statement: If you are spending more money on testing than production, it usually means you have too many non-production environments. Consider the ratio of non-production to production environments and if it is substantially higher you should consider merging testing environments or re-visit why the cost is so much higher.
